function.arg: GEMS: To Health&Safety admins: new employee creation

Dear Colleague,
a new Employee has been created, please access to GEMS in order to find further details.
Employee: ${issue.summary}
Employee ID: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee System ID")) %>
Employee Hiring Date: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Company Hiring Date")) %>
Employee Manager: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Direct Manager")) %>
Employee Detailed Job Title: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Detailed Job Title")) %>
URL Badge : <% out << 'GE' + issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee System ID")) + ";" + issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("First Name")) + ";" + issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Last Name")) + ";https://card.faactechnologies.com/" + issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee System ID")) %>

This is an automatic message to inform you about this new hiring. Please do not answer to this mail.

Regards,
HR Team

[GEMS] New Hiring - [<% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee Company")) != null ? issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee Company")) : "" %>] ${issue.summary}
GEMS: email for HUB Parking Technology USA Inc. Company

Dear Colleague,
a new Employee has been created.
(if email is sent also to the manager) please access GEMS in order to find further details.

Employee: ${issue.summary}
Employee Manager: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Direct Manager")) %>
Employee starting Date: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Company Hiring Date")) %>
Employee Detailed Job Title: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Detailed Job Title")) %>
Employee ID: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("Employee System ID")) %>

If you need further details, please refer to the employee‚Äôs manager.

This is an automatic message to inform you about this new hiring. Please do not answer to this mail.

Regards,
HR Team
